attributes.action: Get a Better Bus Service for Rosliston, Colton in the Elms and Walton on Trent
attributes.additional_details: Smaller villages such as Rosliston, Coton in the Elms currently have a bus that runs every 2 hours. 2 hours isn’t enough. We need one every hour to help get to places more frequently and help boost the income for places the bus stops at. We have had a petition before suggesting it stayed at 2 hours because no one got on the bus. But I have been using the bus for 5 years and it’s constantly full. It also suggests it runs every 2 hours but at the end of the day it is a 3 hour gap, leaving people constantly stranded.
attributes.background: Revisit bus services around Derbyshire ,specifically the number 22 (diamond bus) from Swadlincote to Burton on Trent. To help enhance the buses around smaller villages.
